body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes               Fees & Passes          Fees & Passes  In celebration of the National Park Service's 100th birthday on August 25th the usual $7.00 entrance fee for visitors 16 and older has been suspended for all of 2016! This year visitors don't need to pay to see Lindenwald - so come on out and "Find Your ParK."    America The Beautiful Passes These passes can be purchased online or at the visitors center for use at other federal recreation areas. If you would like to view the different pass options before you arrive click here.
title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
